document_data.name: Cochin chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cochin chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Chakas of 31]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Cochin chaka was based out of the border town of [[Thruldar]] in western [[Estagund]].
document_data.Activity: They were involved exclusively in woodworking.
